version_description:
New Feature: Access to Instagram and Facebook photo album
Easily move your best pictures to your profile picture album
New feature: Stickers and texts added to short videos
Easy to record personalized short videos

Short video
Now you can adjust your video speed to slow or fast!

Personalized recommendations
Find people who like the same things and talk about common interests!

Moments
Repost videos and share your happiness with everybody!

Live
Follow button added to the audience list. If you like a fan, just press the follow button!

Experience optimization
A better user experience using short videos, filters and live broadcast!

We make updates regularly to make Mico better for you.
Every update includes improvements of performance and reliability. Please update to the latest version to experience new features.
Thanks for using Mico, we keep on making Mico better and better.

We make updates regularly to make Mico better for you.
Every update includes improvements of performance and reliability. Please update to the latest version to experience new features.
hanks for using Mico, we keep on making Mico better and better.

We make updates regularly to make Mico better for you.
Every update includes improvements of performance and reliability. Please update to the latest version to experience new features.
Thanks for using Mico, we keep on making Mico better and better.

We make updates regularly to make Mico better for you.
Every update includes improvements of performance and reliability. Please update to the latest version to experience new features.
Thanks for using Mico, we keep on making Mico better and better.

New Mico 5.0
Mico's upgrade is ready! This brand new design will amaze you completely. It brings a more simplified interface, a better way to interact with others and an exclusive system to recommend top people!

New feature: Mico Stories
It will allow you to post your videos to a 24-hour platform where people can check out your story! Become one of the top story-tellers and get as many likes as you can!

Profile page shows Group information

Creating a group is easier now, just two steps to complete it

Birthday reminder is online! Send birthday wishes to your friends!

Co-stream feature added to the live broadcast studio

Manage admins function added to the live broadcast studio

Mico Ranking Board added

Sharing process has been optimized and is more convenient
Now the owner of the group chat has an identity tag
The new feature "Global Gift" added. Send a global gift and people in other live studios will also see it!
Fixed bugs in the co-stream feature

Sharing process has been optimized and is more convenient
Now the owner of the group chat has an identity tag
The new feature "Global Gift" added. Send a global gift and people in other live studios will also see it!
Fixed bugs in the co-stream feature

The new aristocrat feature is rolling out! Reveal your identity and enjoy!
The Lucky Gift feature is on stage, now get chances to obtain 500 times the coins!

The new aristocrat feature is rolling out! Reveal your identity and enjoy!
The Lucky Gift feature is on stage, now get chances to obtain 500 times the coins!

1. The Shopping Mall is finally here! Now you can buy any item you want!
2. Added Gift Shopping Bag feature! If you want to get more gifts, just follow our events!
3. Co-stream feature optimized, user experience has been improved;

1. The Shopping Mall is finally here! Now you can buy any item you want!
2. Added Gift Shopping Bag feature! If you want to get more gifts, just follow our events!
3. Co-stream feature optimized, user experience has been improved.

1. Enable the Count and Marquis noble rank and get more aristrocatic privilege. Come and try them out!
2. More items in the Mall. Hurry up mighty people, go and pick the right item!
3. Recharge promotions are on! More recharge activities coming soon!
4. Want to be the broadcaster's super fan? Come and become a Guardian!

1. New Lucky Bag functionadded, you can sendsome lucky bags to your favorite broadcasters.
2.Flying comments feature is online! Send flying comments during a broadcast, let broadcasters love you more!
3.Quality of video optimized.

1. Now the guardian has an awesome entrance!
2. Better experience sending gifts! Your profile picture will be shown when you send a gift.
3. Bug fixes and performance improvements.

1. Duke and King titles are activated
2. New aristocratic features including anti-block shield and invisible entry are here! Hurry up and try them out!
3. Quality of video optimized, now the broadcaster can adjust the beauty effect!

1. Awesome! Now you can get gifts while co-streaming!
2. Filter live broadcasts by country feature added, now you can check out broadcasters from other countries!

1.Bugs fixed.
2.Better user experience.

1. Mico understands you better! Now the recommended friends will be a right fit for you!
2. The best broadcasters will have an exclusive tag, find your favorite broadcaster faster than ever!
3. You can mute the live broadcast whenever you want!

1. Mico understands you better! Now the recommended friends will be a right fit for you!
2. The best broadcasters will have an exclusive tag, find your favorite broadcaster faster than ever!
3. You can mute the live broadcast whenever you want!

1.Bugs fixed.
2.Better user experience.

Supported Real-time Translation to make communication be more efficient in Mico. Try it NOW!
1. PK function online, support your favorite broadcasters and win the PK game!
2. New gifts with sound effects, sending gifts can also be a good idea for nice music;
3. New aristocrat entry, add spark to your aristocracy!
4.The Live House feature is online! Many activities are waiting for you!

Supported Real-time Translation to makes communication more efficient in Mico. Try it NOW!
What's New:
1.The multiple users co-stream is finally online! Invite your friends to enjoy together this feature!
2.You can choose "mute" while you are co-streaming

Supported Real-time Translation to makes communication more efficient in Mico. Try it NOW!
What's New:
1.Co-streamers can also see the income while they are talking

What's New:
1.PK has a new game method, now you can invite friends to PK!
2.Co-streamers can also see the income while they are talking

What's New:
1.PK has a new game method, now you can invite friends to PK!
2.Co-streamers can also see the income while they are talking

1.Voice broadcast feature just added
2.Now you can play Roulette while you are having a guest call
3.Now you can send private @ to your friends

الآن يمكنك أن تلعب روليت أثناء المداخلة
الآن يمكنك إرسال خاص @ لأصدقائك
Fixed a problem that caused the anchor certification mark not to be displayed in an occasional scene.
Fixed a problem that caused the anchor certification mark not to be displayed in an occasional scene.

1.Live broadcast switch optimized
2.More improvements have been made to the UI of the Arabic version.

تحسين الانتقال بين البث المباشر
تم إجراء المزيد من التحسينات على واجهة المستخدم للنسخة العربية.
Daily task update, show your love to the broadcaster.
Fixed some bugs
More types of medals added, come and get them!

Chat room function is online! Invite your friends to chat with you!
Fixed some bugs
Bug fixed.

Hot gifts are online! Help your favorite broadcaster to be on the hot spot!
Music feature in the live room is online! Turn on the fun in the Live room!

تم تشغيل خاصية الموسيقى في غرفة البث! إبدأ المرح في غرفة البث!

What do you want to say to your fans? Try out the new Broadcast Notice function!

1. Users who have bound the mobile phone number can modify the mobile phone number by themselves
2. Common bugs fixed and some functions optimized
When you are having a multi guest call , the broadcaster can change the theme.

1.Tons of new fun methods in the PK feature, come and try this experience!
2.Broadcasters and admins can kick people out

الكثير من وسائل المرح الجديدة في ميزة التحدي ، تعال وجرب!
يمكن للمذيعين والمشرفين طرد الناس

1.The tricks' effects improved
2.You can quickly reply to your direct message during the broadcast
3.The profile page UI updated, looking much better
